Thank you elitewebt3 for your excellent torrent, and thank you Piratebay for your great community. Thanks all.

BTW - All you guys asking for if its NTSC / PAL - The torrent uploader said "USA" so it's safe to assume he is within that region - If you check the wikipedia "PAL REGION" you should see that USA is NTSC - so by that logic this should be NTSC.

Also, for you people wondering how to play this on your pc - Go to google and type in "Pcsx2" and download the 0.9.8 version (It's the latest atm) - Download this torrent - Load the ISO onto the program and whala! You should have one of the greatest games ever within your playable reach. Enjoy guys, it's a really awesome game.
